mapper.sql: TRS_ID, REG_ID, TARGET_CODE, SUB_CODE, GROUP_CODE, GROUP_DETAIL_CODE, DATE_TYPE, SQL_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_tar_reg_sql_tb
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from ht_tar_reg_sql_tb where TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and OP_TYPE != 'D'
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_tar_reg_sql_tb SET OP_TYPE = 'D' WHERE TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_tar_reg_sql_tb (TRS_ID, REG_ID, TARGET_CODE, SUB_CODE, GROUP_CODE, GROUP_DETAIL_CODE, DATE_TYPE, SQL_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_tar_reg_sql_tb
TRS_ID,
REG_ID,
TARGET_CODE,
SUB_CODE,
GROUP_CODE,
GROUP_DETAIL_CODE,
DATE_TYPE,
SQL_CODE,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,
#{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ht_tar_reg_sql_tb
TRS_ID = #{record.trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_CODE = #{record.subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_CODE = #{record.groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_DETAIL_CODE = #{record.groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_TYPE = #{record.dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_CODE = #{record.sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_tar_reg_sql_tb set TRS_ID = #{record.trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_CODE = #{record.subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_CODE = #{record.groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_DETAIL_CODE = #{record.groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_TYPE = #{record.dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_CODE = #{record.sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_tar_reg_sql_tb
REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_DETAIL_CODE = #{groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_TYPE = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQL_CODE = #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_tar_reg_sql_tb set REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_DETAIL_CODE = #{groupDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_TYPE = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQL_CODE = #{sqlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select T1.TRS_ID, T1.REG_ID, T1.TARGET_CODE, T1.SUB_CODE, T1.GROUP_CODE, T1.GROUP_DETAIL_CODE, T1.DATE_TYPE, T1.SQL_CODE, T1.OP_TYPE, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.MODIFY_TIME, T1.CREATOR_ID, T1.MODIFIER_ID FROM HT_TAR_REG_SQL_TB T1 LEFT JOIN HT_TEM_REG_TB T2 ON T1.REG_ID = T2.REG_ID WHERE T1.TARGET_CODE = '${code}' AND T1.OP_TYPE not in ('D') AND T2.REG_CODE = '${regCode}'
